polar_meshgrid#

eosdxanalysis.preprocessing.utils.polar_meshgrid(output_shape=(256, 256), r_count=10, theta_count=10, rmin=20, rmax=110, quadrant_fold=True, half_step_rotation=True)#

Creates a polar meshgrid with unique label per cell.

Parameters:

  • output_shape ((int, int)) – Shape of polar meshgrid

  • r_count (int) – Number of annuli

  • theta_count (int) – Number of sectors

  • rmin (int) – Start radius

  • rmax (int) – End radius

  • quadrant_fold (bool) – Return a quadrant-folded image if True. Default is False.

  • half_step_rotation (bool) – Rotate meshgrid by half sector angle size.

Returns:

meshgrid – Returns ndarray of shape output_shape with unique label per cell.

Return type:

ndarray

Notes

Cell label values start at 1 to distinguish unused image portions
